Literature.Title: New antiseptic peptides to protect against endotoxin-mediated shock
Literature.Author: Gutsmann T, Razquin-Olazarán I, Kowalski I, Kaconis Y, Howe J, Bartels R, Hornef M, Schürholz T, Rössle M, Sanchez-Gómez S, Moriyon I, Martinez de Tejada G, Brandenburg K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bordetella bronchiseptica CUN 11844-99(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CUN 4158-02(MIC=256µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=256µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus CUN 3792-99(MIC=1024µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia CUN 3998-00(MIC=512µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=64µg/ml)
